name: Map of Ignis - Demo Ver 0.0.0
description:
Map of Ignis is a 3D anime RPG. You play as Rose, a farmer from a village, or Nono, a fallen angel.

This is an unfinished demo and is only the first 4 levels out of 30. There are many glitches and missing features. Eventually, the game will have 4 more characters to play as, and more levels to roam around!

Game is about 0.812MB or 1GB in size and runs on Windows 10/PC. The final release will have an Xbox version.

You can follow the development of this game in our Discord server:  https://discord.gg/8PgXffM3u2
